column4: I'm facing problem with gpg keys. When running apt-get update it gives me errors in the gpg authentication. so I ran the keys in this script http://pastebin.com/CKhGjAUZ but the problem still exists :s
why on earth did you make that a bash script?
to answer your question: because I am lazy
i dont even remember my question, so i'll take you at your word.. :)
